sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Home Depot topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.8%.
Year to date, Home Depot registers a 25.5% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Chevron, trading down 1.7%.
Chevron is lower by about 28.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Exxon Mobil, trading down 1.4%, and Walmart, trading up 0.6% on the day.
